document_data.name: Nematodes of the Northdark
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nematodes of the Northdark''''' was a seminal scholarly tome on subterranean worms.
document_data.History: Originally kept in the library fortress of [[Candlekeep]], the book was lost at some point in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], having been taken into the [[Underdark]] by an explorer. [[Wendolyn Shoosh]], of the [[Candlekeep Order of Librarians Militant]], spent decades tracking the lost tome before locating it in the [[drow]] settlement [[Zesraena]] in the [[Northdark]]. In {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Shoosh successfully petitioned an [[adventurer]] to retrieve the book.
